messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: Project Alpha-X DATE: 06/09/42  Several financial institutions have reported cyberattacks that led to the breach of thousands of user data. Preliminary findings suggest a sophisticated hacker group with possibly state-backed resources.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  CYBERSECURITY LEAD: Captain R. T. Nicholson oversees the cybercrime unit tasked with tracing and counteracting the hacker group. DIGITAL FORENSICS: Detectives U. V. Osborne and W. X. Mitchell specialize in tracing digital footprints and have found malware signatures linked to past known cyberattacks. CRYPTOGRAPHY: Detectives Y. Z. Lawrence and A. B. Gray are decrypting the malicious code used in the breaches to understand its functionality. PATROL: Patrol Officers C. D. Weber, E. F. Turner, and G. H. Stuart are visiting institutions physically to gather any relevant CCTV footage and to ensure offline safety. INTERNATIONAL LIAISON: Lieutenant I. J. Price collaborates with global law enforcement agencies to share information and insights about similar attacks worldwide. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  The hacker group has demanded a ransom in cryptocurrency. Negotiations are ongoing.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain R. T. Nicholson  
Officer Context: Captain Nicholson heads the cybercrime unit and is leading the investigation into the cyberattacks.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Detective U. V. Osborne  
Officer Context: Detective Osborne specializes in digital forensics and is tracing the hackers' activities.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective W. X. Mitchell  
Officer Context: Detective Mitchell is assisting in identifying malware signatures from the cyberattacks.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective Y. Z. Lawrence  
Officer Context: Detective Lawrence is working on decrypting the malicious code to understand its operation.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective A. B. Gray  
Officer Context: Detective Gray aids in the decryption process and analyzes the hacker's methods.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officers C. D. Weber, E. F. Turner, and G. H. Stuart  
Officer Context: These officers are collecting any potential physical evidence and ensuring the safety of financial institutions.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officers 

Officer Name: Lieutenant I. J. Price  
Officer Context: Lieutenant Price is the bridge between local enforcement and international agencies, sharing findings about the cyberattacks.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant
